definitions.text: activities that are enjoyable or amusing
examples: I do it for the fun of it
he is fun to have around

definitions.text: verbal wit or mockery (often at another's expense but not to be taken seriously)
examples: he became a figure of fun
she asked for money and then the fun began
they began to fight like fun

definitions.text: a disposition to find (or make) causes for amusement
examples: he was fun to be with
